directions: Place 3/4 of the oats in a food processor and pulse into a flour. 2.Add all dry ingredients (first 5 ingredients, including the pulsed oats) into a bowl. 3.In another bowl, whisk together the milk, oil, eggs and vanilla. 4.Add to dry ingredients and mix until combined. 5.Pour the batter into a muffin mould with liners and bake at 350 F until golden brown and set in the middle (about 15 minutes).
title: BAKED OATMEAL
